channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Light pollution a new Alzheimer's risk factor
item.description: Outdoor light at night could be a significant risk factor in Alzheimer's disease, according to new research from Rush.

item.title: Genes with strong impact on menopause timing also link to cancer risk
